text: @realDonaldTrump Congratulations President Trump, because #TrumpKnewAndDidNothing , more than #80000deadAmericans including 225 in #Milwaukee  of #COVID19 and counting. Yes, you made it happen. We devote ourselves to making sure you don’t occupy the White House on November 3, #ByeDon2020
